channel.title: Need a

item.title: Need a
item.dc:creator: @Helbound Helbound
item.description:
@Helbound wrote:

Thats not what hes asking, hes asking for someone to give him the code for making the command save to the ‘members folder’. But I do have a question for Vladie.

What exactly do you want the command to save? Like do you want it to save the characters name to the members folder? or maybe save it to a certain file in the folder?

Read full topic

item.title: Need a
item.dc:creator: @volarscape volarscape
item.description:
@volarscape wrote:

if(command.startsWith(“giveprem”) && playerRights >= 0) {
String name = command.substring(10);
try {
int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];
c.playerIsMember = 1;
c.savemoreinfo();
c.savechar();
c.disconnected = true;
sendMessage(name+" is now an Premium");
} catch(Exception e) {
sendMessage(name+" either isn’t online or doesn’t exist");
}
}
that makes it so it isnt admin

Read full topic

item.title: Need a
item.dc:creator: @Vladie Vladie
item.description:
@Vladie wrote:

I need someone to make me a command such as …

if(command.startsWith("giveprem") && playerRights >= 3) { String name = command.substring(10); try { int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name); client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p]; c.playerIsMember = 1; c.savemoreinfo(); c.savechar(); c.disconnected = true; sendMessage(name+" is now an Premium"); } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage(name+" either isn't online or doesn't exist"); } }
But I need it to save to the “members” folder in C:\Users\Byron\Desktop\XSoft\XSoft

Can anyone fix this for me?

-thanks

Read full topic
